Class LocalAccountsStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.Stub
      • com.vmware.appliance.LocalAccountsStub
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocalAccounts, LocalAccountsTypes, Service

    public class LocalAccountsStub
extends com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.Stub
implements LocalAccounts
    Remote stub implementation of the LocalAccounts API service.

    WARNING: Internal API, subject to change in future versions.
